ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and (!ischanged( P2C_Sent__c), !ischanged( Product_Code__c), !ischanged(Status_Changes__c), !ischanged(Time_Email_Sent__c), !ischanged(Propose_to_Close_Time__c), !ischanged(Last_Propose_to_Close_Time__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE (Status), 'Propose to Close'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Propose to Close'),!ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Re-Open'), $User.Id != '005300000042rPL', $User.Id != '005300000041m9d', !CONTAINS($User.Username, 'api'), $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status should be changed Re-Open to modify this Case.
